goals.description: Create unified multi-language deployment orchestrator that can deploy applications across all language SDKs
goals.success_criteria: Deployment orchestrator can build, package, and deploy applications for Python, Rust, JavaScript, Ruby, C#, Go, PHP, Java, and Bash with unified deployment pipeline

goals.description: Implement cross-language deployment configuration and environment management system
goals.success_criteria: Centralized deployment configuration with environment-specific settings, dependency management, and deployment validation across all languages

goals.description: Build multi-language deployment monitoring and rollback system
goals.success_criteria: Real-time deployment monitoring, health checks, automatic rollback capabilities, and deployment history tracking across all language deployments
